name: server.R
ui.R
content:
library(shiny) library(bslib) library(markdown) library(shinythemes) library(shinyWidgets) library(shinydashboard) ui <- bslib::page( # https://groups.google.com/g/shiny-discuss/c/ugNEaHizlck tags$style(type = "text/css", ".awesome-checkbox{ margin-left:12px; font-size: 12px; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px }"), tags$style(type = "text/css", "pretty-radiobuttons{ padding-top: -4px; padding-bottom: -4px }"), theme = bs_theme(bootswatch = NULL), # "cerulean"), # "cerulean", "cosmo", "cyborg", "darky", "flatly", "journal", "litera", "lumen", "lux", "materia", "minty", "morph", "pulse", "quartz", "sandstone", "simplex", "sketchy", "slate", "solar", "spacelab", "superhero", "united", "vapor", "yeti", "zephyr" titlePanel(h1( id = "title", "Neonatal early-onset sepsis risk calculator", align="left", # align="center", # style='position:fixed; background-color: #FFFFFF; z-index: 1; top: 0px;' ) ), # END titlePanel fluidRow( layout_column_wrap( fixed_width = TRUE, width = "385px", card( card_header("Risk factors at birth"), card_body( selectInput(inputId = "prevalence", label = p("Prevalence of early-onset sepsis (consider chorioamnionitis !)"), choices = c("0.1‰ live births" = 1, "0.2‰ live births" = 2, "0.3‰ live births" = 3, "0.4‰ live births" = 4, "0.5‰ live births" = 5, "0.6‰ live births" = 6, "0.7‰ live births" = 7, "0.8‰ live births" = 8, "0.9‰ live births" = 9, "1.0‰ live births" = 10, "2.0‰ live births" = 11, "4.0‰ live births" = 12), selected = 4, multiple = FALSE, selectize = TRUE, # width = '100%', # size = 'sm' ), fluidRow( column(6,style=list("padding-right: 5px;"), numericInputIcon( "ga_weeks", "Gestational age (wks)", value = 39, step = 1, min = 34, max = 42, size = 'sm', width = '400px' ) ), column(6,style=list("padding-left: 5px;"), numericInputIcon( "ga_days", label = "Gestational age (days)", value = 3, step = 1, min = 0, max = 6, # icon = list(HTML("Gestational age [days]        ")), size = 'sm', width = '400px' ) ) ), numericInputIcon( "highest_temp", "Highest maternal antepartum temperature (°C)", value = 38.0, step = 0.1, min = 36.0, max = 42.0, size = 'sm', width = '400px' ), numericInputIcon( "rom", "Length of rupture of membranes (hrs)", value = 0, min = 0, max = 250, step = 1, size = 'sm', width = '400px' ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( prettyRadioButtons( # awesomeRadio( inputId = "gbs_status", label = "Maternal GBS status", choices = c("Negative" = 1, "Positive" = 2, "Unknown" = 3), selected = 3, inline = TRUE, status = "primary" ), style = htmltools::css(font.size = "14px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( prettyRadioButtons( # awesomeRadio( inputId = "ip_ab", label = "Type of intrapartum antibiotics", choices = c( "Broad spectrum antibiotics >4 hrs before birth" = 1, "Broad spectrum antibiotics 2-3.9 hrs before birth" = 2, "GBS specific antibiotics >2 hrs before birth" = 3, "No antibiotics or any antibiotics ≤2 hrs prior to birth" = 4 ), selected = 4, inline = FALSE, status = "primary" ), style = htmltools::css(font.size = "14px") ) ) ), card( card_header("Risk and guideline by clinical presentation"), card_body( fillable = TRUE, prettyRadioButtons( # awesomeRadio( inputId = "clin_presentation", label = "Classification of clinical presentation *", choices = c("Well appearing" = 1, "Equivocal presentation" = 2, "Clinical illness" = 3), selected = 1, inline = FALSE, status = "primary" ), verbatimTextOutput('EOS_risk_at_birth'), verbatimTextOutput('EOS_risk_as_per_presentation'), valueBoxOutput("box_recommendation"), # ,width=7 valueBoxOutput("box_vitals") ) ), card( card_header("Help with clinical classification"), card_body( prettyRadioButtons( # awesomeRadio( inputId = "btnClinIllness", label = NULL, choices = c("Clinical illness"), selected = character(0), inline = FALSE, status = "primary", ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "a1", label = "Persistent need for NCPAP / HFNC / mechanical ventilation (outside of the delivery room)", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "a2", label = "Hemodynamic instability requiring vasoactive drugs", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "a3", label = "Neonatal encephalopathy /Perinatal depression (Seizure, Apgar Score @ 5 minutes < 5)", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "a4", label = "Need for supplemental O2 ≥ 2 hours to maintain oxygen saturations > 90% (outside of the delivery room)", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), prettyRadioButtons( # awesomeRadio( inputId = "btnEquivocal", label = NULL, choices = c("Equivocal"), selected = character(0), inline = FALSE, status = "primary", ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( p("Persistent physiologic abnormality ≥ 4 hrs"), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px", font.size = "13px") #, color = "red") # , margin.left: "10px" ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "b1", label = "Tachycardia (HR ≥ 160)", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "b2", label = "Tachypnea (RR ≥ 60)", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "b3", label = HTML("Temperature instability
(≥ 100.4˚F or < 97.5˚F) (≥ 38˚C or < 36.4˚)"), value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "b4", label = "Respiratory distress (grunting, flaring, or retracting) not requiring supplemental O2", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( p("Two or more physiologic abnormalities lasting for ≥ 2 h"), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px", font.size = "13px") # , color = "red") # , margin.left: "10px" ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "c1", label = "Tachycardia (HR ≥ 160)", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "c2", label = "Tachypnea (RR ≥ 60)", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "c3", label = HTML("Temperature instability
(≥ 100.4˚F or < 97.5˚F) (≥ 38˚C or < 36.4˚)"), value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "c4", label = "Respiratory distress (grunting, flaring, or retracting) not requiring supplemental O2", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ), prettyRadioButtons( # awesomeRadio( inputId = "btnWellAppearing", label = NULL, choices = c("Well apearing"), selected = character(0), inline = FALSE, status = "primary", ), htmltools::tagAppendAttributes( awesomeCheckbox( inputId = "d1", label = "No persistent physiologic abnormalities", value = FALSE, status = "primary", width = '400px' ), style = htmltools::css(margin.bottom = "-4px", margin.top = "-4px") ) ) ), # card( # card_header("Help with clinical classification"), # card_body( # fillable = TRUE, # # # ) # ) ) # END ayout_column_wrap ),# END fluidRow(1) fluidRow( card( card_header("Background and references"), card_body( includeMarkdown("eoscalc.md") ) ) ) # END fluidRow(2) ) # END bslib::page()

name: eoscalc.md
content:
Background information The Probability of Neonatal Early-Onset Sepsis calculator is based Ref 1 & 2. The risk of early-onset sepsis can be estimated in an infant born ≥ 34 weeks gestation based on maternal risk factors along with the infant's clinical presentation. This risk prediction model reduced the proportion of newborns undergoing laboratory testing and receiving empirical antibiotic treatment without apparent adverse effects (Ref 4). The Sepsis Risk Calculator is a rigorous, quantitative tool to aid in EONS risk assessment, but it must be accompanied by clinical assessment and vigilance throughout the newborn period.
Definitions: * The definitive diagnosis of **intraamniotic infection** is that made by amniotic fluid Gram-stain and/or culture or by placental histopathologic testing. Such clear diagnostic information will rarely be available at the time of delivery for infants born at or near term. Suspected intraamniotic infection is defined as a single maternal intrapartum temperature ≥39.0°C or maternal temperature of 38.0°C to 38.9°C in combination with 1 or more of maternal leukocytosis, purulent cervical drainage, or fetal tachycardia. * Intrapartum antibiotics GBS IAP: penicillin, amoxicillin, clindamycin, erythromycin, cefazolin, vancomycin Broad spectrum antibiotics: other cephalosporins, fluoroquinolone, extended spectrum β-lactam, or any IAP antibiotic plus an aminoglycoside * Classification of Infant's Clinical Presentation I. Clinical Illness 1. Persistent need for NCPAP / HFNC / mechanical ventilation (outside of the delivery room) 2. Hemodynamic instability requiring vasoactive drugs 3. Neonatal encephalopathy /Perinatal depression Seizure Apgar Score @ 5 minutes < 5 4. Need for supplemental O2 > 2 hours to maintain oxygen saturations > 90% (outside of the delivery room)
II. Equivocal 1. Persistent physiologic abnormality ≥ 4 hrs Tachycardia (HR ≥ 160) Tachypnea (RR ≥ 60) Temperature instability (≥ 100.4˚F or < 97.5˚F) (≥ 38˚C or < 36.4˚) Respiratory distress (grunting, flaring, or retracting) not requiring supplemental O2 2. Two or more physiologic abnormalities lasting for > 2 hrs Tachycardia (HR ≥ 160) Tachypnea (RR ≥ 60) Temperature instability (≥ 100.4˚F or < 97.5˚F) (≥ 38˚C or < 36.4˚) Respiratory distress (grunting, flaring, or retracting) not requiring supplemental O2 Note: abnormality can be intermittent
III.Well Appearing No persistent physiologic abnormalities The clinical calculator can also be accessed at: https://neonatalsepsiscalculator.kaiserpermanente.org/InfectionProbabilityCalculator.aspx References: 1. Puopolo KM, Draper D, Wi S, Newman TB, Zupancic J, Lieberman E, Smith M, Escobar GJ. Estimating the probability of neonatal early-onset infection on the basis of maternal risk factors. Pediatrics 2011;128:e1155-63. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22025590 2. Escobar GJ, Puopolo KM, Wi S, Turk BJ, Kuzniewicz MW, Walsh EM, Newman TB, Zupancic J, Lieberman E, Draper D. Stratification of risk of early-onset sepsis in newborns > 34 weeks' gestation. Pediatrics 2014;133:30-6. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24366992 3. Benitz WE, Wynn JL, Polin RA. Reappraisal of guidelines for management of neonates with suspected early-onset sepsis. J Pediatr. 2015 Apr;166(4):1070-4. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25641240 4. Kuzniewicz MW, Walsh EM, Li S, Fischer A, Escobar GJ. Development and Implementation of an Early-Onset Sepsis Calculator to Guide Antibiotic Management in Late Preterm and Term Neonates. Jt Comm J Qual Patient Saf. 2016 May;42(5):232-9. http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27066927 5. Kuzniewicz MW, Puopolo KM, Fischer A, Walsh EM, Li S, Newman TB, Kipnis P, Escobar GJ. A Quantitative, Risk-Based Approach to the Management of Neonatal Early-Onset Sepsis. JAMA Pediatr. 2017 Apr 1;171(4):365-371. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28241253 6. Rajbhandari S, La Gamma EF. Early-Onset Sepsis Calculator-Risk of Delaying Treatment. JAMA Pediatr. 2017 Oct 1;171(10):1015. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28806441 7. Kuzniewicz MW , Escobar GJ, Puopolo KM. Early-Onset Sepsis Calculator-Reply. JAMA Pediatr. 2017 Oct 1;171(10):1015- 1016. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28806448 8.
